hippoShortcode.name: tab
hippoShortcode.title: Tab
hippoShortcode.code:
[hippo-tabs id="" class="th-top-nav"]
[hippo-tab-item title="Tab1" id="th-tab1" selected="yes" class=""] ... [/hippo-tab-item]
[hippo-tab-item title="Tab2" id="th-tab2" selected="no" class=""] ... [/hippo-tab-item]
[hippo-tab-item title="Tab3" id="th-tab3" selected="no" class=""] ... [/hippo-tab-item]
[/hippo-tabs]

options.title: Options
options.option:
"th-top-nav" class in "hippo-tabs" will make top positioned tab.
selected="yes" in "hippo-tab-item" shortcode will make default opened tab item.
all "id" of "hippo-tab-item" should unique value.
"tabs-left" class in "hippo-tabs" will make left positioned tab.
"tabs-right" class in "hippo-tabs" will make right positioned tab.
